name: Etty
description: AWS Lambda function for Etty Words Alexa skill

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.zip: zip -r src/deploy/etty.zip src/etty.dynamo.js src/handlers.js src/index.js src/language.json src/node_modules
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run zip
scripts.build: npm test && npm run install_prod && npm run deploy

author: DungBeetleBASH
